name: Modern Last Commando Shooter
description:
Modern Last Commando Shooter is one of the best first person commando shooting game ever. Play the ultimate 3D commando game with thrilling adventure and action. This Last Commando shooting game has great modern combat zones, with smooth controlling and marvellous graphics. You are the only expert commando shooter with great gorilla commando skills. It is one of the most amazing game of commando shooting so far. The last commando 3D is a real and one of the best sniper game. This game is very interesting and thrilling army shooting game. Kill the enemy before they kill you and get your land back. In the game, you do not have enough weapon and bullets. Therefore, you need to kill enemy and try to grab their weapons. Use their weapons against them and win the mission. You are the last hope of your people. Kill the last person of your enemy to take revenge from your enemy and do not be killed, as you are the last hope of your people and your nation. Destroy your enemy at any cost.
Features:
• Multiple Guns (Pistol , Knife , M4 )
• Spectacular 3D graphics
• Great sound effects ( On , Off option )
• Smooth gameplay
• Critical commando adventurous missions
• challenging level in different battle fields
• GPS satellite system to track the enemy
• Joystick to control direction
• User- friendly GUI and controls

Modern Last Commando Shooter game is a FPS Last Sniper Elite Commando Shooting Missions Combat game. It is challenge for you to complete all Frontline gun shooting Commando Elite-Missions.
